bibl.title: Another Fragment of the Declaration of Landed Property from the Province of Arabia.
bibl.note: P. Jerus. Rockefeller Mus. Box 866, a fragment among the so-called P. Se'elim, constitutes the left part of P. Jerus. Mus. of Israel Inv. 3001 a-c [ed.: Hannah M. COTTON, Fragments of a Declaration of Landed Property from the Province of Arabia, ZPE 85 (1991) pp. 263-267 et pl. IX]. "Cave of the Letters" in Nahal Hever, 25 April 127 or 128 CE. The Greek documents among the P. Se'elim could be part of the Babatha Archive.
COTTON Hannah M., Another Fragment of the Declaration of Landed Property from the Province of Arabia.
ZPE 99 (1993) pp. 115-121 et pl. XIII d.
141.4 P. Jerus. Mus. of Israel Inv. 3001 a-c + P. Jerus. Rockefeller Mus. Box 866
